data.title: Dave was a great driver!
data.text: I was fortunate to have Dave as my driver to and from the Hotel Alyeska.  He was a good driver and willing to share his knowledge of the Anchorage area.  Dave made sure I saw an eagle, beluga whale, and a moose.  It was also very nice to meet his wife, Denise.  Thank you Dave.  Nancy

data.title: Fantastic Alyeska Tour!!
data.text: My partner and I booked a last minute wildlife tour today via the Alyeska Resort where we are staying. We ended up on a very unique trip with super friendly driver Dave who clearly adores his job!!! He made the trip (which was magic in itself) even more enjoyable telling tales, funny experiences he had had, and by filling us with an abundance of facts about the area and what we were seeing! When we were finished he brought us to see the glaciers and even though he's probably been there a million times, was as excited as we were arriving to each stop! Can't recommend this enough, we really had such a fabulous day and couldn't have been accommodated more! We will certainly be back to the hotel and the area, and I would do the trip again in the morning!!

data.title: Great drive with Dave!!!
data.text: Dave from Four Seasons picked us up at Alyeska Resort to drop us off at Anchorage airport.  Dave was very knowledgeable on all things Alaska and we learned alot from him.  The conversations and beautiful scenery made the drive go by fast.  Would highly recommend Four Season Taxi and especially request Dave!

data.title: Like having my own private tour guide
data.text: The Hotel Alyeska arranged my pick up at the airport & my driver Dave was very pleasant & knowledgeable. Not your typical drive to the hotel...he shared his passion for Alaska & the region with interesting anecdotes & facts as he familiarized me with the area. It made the hour drive fly by. I booked my return trip to the airport with the same company because of the great experience I had. Would highly recommend a ride with Dave!

data.title: Reliable, punctual - and informative!
data.text:
My wife and I recently advance-booked Four Seasons Trans Group to move us and our ski / snowboard gear from Anchorage Airport to the Alyeska Resort, and then for the return journey some days later, and we can honestly say that these two road trips added another valuable dimension to our whole Alaskan experience!
We had the same driver, Dave Earl, for both journeys, and aside from being completely reliable, punctual and polite etc, his genuine enthusiasm for 'all things Alaska' and his obvious background knowledge of a vast array of local, environmental and wildlife issues kept us entertained and suitably informed throughout. (And if there is a mountain goat, moose or eagle anywhere nearby he will point it out to you..!) 
Highly recommended, in our opinion anyway.....

data.title: Best Shuttle Service!
data.text: We used the Four Seasons transportation to drive us between Anchorage and the Alyeska Resort.  This was the default transportation for us and we are so happy we got the driver we did.  Dave was amazing and was a great tour guide along the way.  It made the hour ride very informative and memorable.  He is a great guy and is really passionate about Alaska.  He showed us all the beautiful sites along the way and taught us so many things about Alaska that we could share after our trip.  Use this company and ask for Dave and you will get the best tour guide for free along with your drive.  Enjoy!

data.title: Our new friend!
data.text: If there were a 100 stars, I would give them all! WAY more than a ride! All of the drivers with this company are fantastic but if you have the opportunity, ask for Dave! Dave is more of a tour guide than a driver! He has been in Alaska for 45+ years and he knows all of the best spots and stories! We had a 45 minute drive to Anchorage from our hotel, Alyeska, in Girdwood and he made the drive one of the best parts of the trip! He told us all of the old folk tales of the land, made sure we didn't miss out on any of the beautiful sites, pointed out the amazing wildlife and made us feel right at home, right away! And that was just one way! On the trip back, he had saved new stories, even pulled over on the road in several spots at places he knew would be great photo opportunities! He even keeps a pair of binoculars on him to show us the wildlife on top of the mountains! Dave made the ride much more than a ride to both myself and my husband, he made us feel welcomed to Alaska, like we belonged. If you're riding, you've got to go in style, you've got to go with this company! I promise you won't regret it!

data.title: Great shuttle service!
data.text: We utilized Four Seasons for two rides between the airport and The Alyeska Resort.  Our driver,Dave a native of the area was a great resource of information.  On the drive he spotted wildlife, tipped us on the best restaurants, provided a background and history of Alaska, and even stopped along the way for a photo opportunity of the bore tide in the Turnagain Arm. We enjoyed his wit and company.

data.title: Safe, timely and friendly!
data.text: Our driver, Dave, was outstanding!  He drove us from Anchorage to Girdwood and then back again.  My husband and I felt safe with his driving and he was very friendly and courteous.  He is honest and a hard worker.  He also was a great tour guide.  I would use them again on a future visit!  Thank you!

data.title: Best Hotel Shuttle in Anchorage
data.text: We guarantee great service with courteous, prompt, and knowledgable drivers. We are currently serving  Anchorage, Girdwood, Wasilla, Talkeetna, and Seward.

data.title: Excellent customer service
data.text: My wife and I, arrived from Belgium in Anchorage on a late flight, and were pleasantly surprised by the prompt and professional service of Four Seasons Trans Group. All scheduled pickups were on time, no hassles and no fuss. Not only was our driver, Dave, very courteous and friendly to deal with but he was also very knowledgeable about the Alaska wilderness. We’ve booked Four Seasons for a few trips while we were staying the Alyeska Resort. Not only did they provide shuttle service but they were also our tour guides during our visits at the Wild Life conservation center and a sightseeing tour in and around the Kenai nature reserve. I would more than 100% recommend the Four Seasons Trans Group.

data.title: Amazingly knowledgable driver
data.text:
This is our first trip to Anchorage, Alaska. We were staying at the Hotel Alyeska and booked them these guys through the hotel for going to the airport to catch an early morning flight. I can't recommend the driver enough. He arrived dot on time at 4:30 am and was extremely knowledgeable about the history of anchorage. And the fact that he had a great sense of humor meant that the hour long drive to Anchorage went by in no time. I mean how many guys would make an effort to talk to complete strangers to make sure that they 
are entertained at 4:30 am ! 
My only regret is not having any cash in my wallet to tip him. I just have two tips for other people staying at Hotel Alyeska:
1) Please check with the Concierge to book these guys for you 
2) Make sure that you have enough cash to tip the driver else perhaps you too (like me) would be sitting at the airport writing a guilt review to somehow thank the driver who drove you to the airport :)

data.title: Wonderful customer service everytime
data.text:
My first trip up to Alyeska Resort for a business trip. The hotel reserved transportation with Four Seasons Trans. Met their driver Dave. He not only made me feel safe in really bad weather but was a terrific tour guide all the way up. This year I  requested Dave. He was just as wonderful and positive and knowledgeable. My sister was so happy too. She's a nervous rider but made her   feel right at ease.
I often use drivers in my line of work and would highly recommend this transportation company. ASK FOR DAVE.

data.title: Amazing people and services!
data.text:
I'm from Los Angeles, California and for my birthday I went with my mom, my sister, and my aunt to Alaska and stayed at the Clarion Hotel in downtown Anchorage. Arriving at the airport, we called the hotel and they sent one of the shuttle drivers to pick us up and it was there in about 10-15 minutes. The van itself was very, clean and big enough for us four to fit along with our suitcases. The driver, Dave, was friendly and helpful right away and offered a five minute detour to take us to see some sights - we gave him ten minutes and it was spectacular! He told us all about the mountains and myths and pulled over more than once to allow us to take pictures and didn't rush us. He was so amazing and gave us the service one cannot pay in Los Angeles for. The next night, after a long day, we were asking the front desk for a way to a nearby liquor store and burger place and coincidentally the owner of the shuttle service, Marc, was there and called up one of the drivers... Just for a 10 minute ride TO A LIQUOR STORE. This driver, Ron, was just as amazing as Dave - Ron was patient and friendly, and just an absolute pleasure to speak to. On the way home, our driver (did not catch his name but he was from Europe and had a slight accent) was very helpful and made a stop for us to enjoy the view one last time before we left.

All in all, the trip to Alaska was beautiful but was made even better by the services of this company. Highly recommend it, especially for tourists looking to see the sights Anchorage has to offer. This service was a 15 out of 10.

data.title: Excellent service - highly recommened for transport!
data.text: I was lucky to book Four Season's Trans Group last weekend for a transfer from Aleyeska to Anchorage airport. They were able to quickly respond to my request (e.g. within 1 hour) and were fantastic. My driver, Dave, went out of his way to tell me the history and legends of alaska and even pulled off the road for a few minutes so I could see the aurora for the first time ever. It was more than an airport transport, it was like having a family friend take me to the aiport. I would highly recommend this company. Another thing was that his vehicle was HUGE so even though it was only me he was transported, I could have easily put about 6 people in the vehicle with luggage.
